name: Aizoban
tagline: An online and offline Manga reading application for Android.
body: Aizoban ======= ![Feature Graphic](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5429148/16e40ee2-83af-11e4-9588-f52f1104b9c4.jpg) An Aizōban is a quality collector's edition volume. Likewise, "Aizoban: Your Manga Reader" is an online and an offline manga reader which aims to provide a great visual user experience when browsing and reading manga. ✔ Access to over 35 000 manga series from currently 5 sources: MangaEden (EN), MangaHere (EN), MangaReader (EN), MangaEden (IT), and MangaHere (ES). ✔ Amazingly fast and immersing viewer with options to switch reading direction, lock orientation, and lock zoom. ✔ A search tool capable of instantly filtering and ordering manga series by name, genre (not for all sources), and status. ✔ An "Exploring" function to discover random manga series. ✔ A download manager to collect your desired manga series offline. ✔ Your personalized list of favourite manga series and recently read chapters. ✔ Easy settings to manage your reading experience such as "Enable Lazy Loading" to conserve bandwidth. ### What's New? **Version 1.0.3**: - Immersive Mode for 4.4+ Android users. - Partial fix for Chapter Help for 4.1 to 4.3 Android users. - General fixes to some views. **Version 1.0.2**: - Fixed overlapping chapter downloads. - Fixed MangaEden naming. **Version 1.0.1**: - Hopefully fix boot (Lollipop users) and memory crashes. **Version 1.0.0**: - The application has been rewritten. All prior data from previous versions of Alpha and Beta will be lost. To clear old data from previous versions, please "Clear Data" for Aizoban in your device's "Setting" application. ### APK Download [**Direct Download**: (Version 1.03)](Aizoban/Aizoban_16.apk) ## Screenshots ### Phone ![1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5429149/25b54f9e-83af-11e4-88a1-52da523862dd.png) ![2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5429152/25b9383e-83af-11e4-9116-fee08b1b257d.png) ![3](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5429150/25b6a038-83af-11e4-9f10-a7333b569cca.png) ![4](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5429153/25baf610-83af-11e4-87cb-6372988bc76a.png) ![5](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5429151/25b889de-83af-11e4-9288-37b3757a6ec1.png) ![6](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5429155/25bcb338-83af-11e4-8d79-e5d1a9ff77a7.png) ![7](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5429154/25bc361a-83af-11e4-9dd6-a80693983405.png) ![8](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5429156/25c10622-83af-11e4-8ec8-a67a434bcc38.png) ### 7-inch Tablet ![9](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5603074/bd5e8c16-9340-11e4-856a-000fd5101a17.png) ![10](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5603075/bd65f88e-9340-11e4-9199-5ae165e94d9e.png) ### 10-inch Tablet ![11](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5603077/c1e562f0-9340-11e4-8e4a-b6bc9506c423.png) ![12](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9499097/5603076/c1e50c7e-9340-11e4-895f-4b343b32a3e8.png) ## License Copyright 2014 Jacob Park Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
